title: Luka Is Unreal, Fixing the Sixers, and "Kobe Day" | Real Ones
description:
Logan and Raja discuss Luka Doncic's stunning performance against the Clippers and where he fits in when it comes to the top franchise building blocks in the NBA right now (07:04). They are also joined by Ringer staff writer Tyler R. Tynes to talk about the 76ers getting swept out of the bubble and how to fix the absolute mess of a team (39:42). Finally, Logan and Raja remember Kobe Bryant on "Kobe Day" with memorable stories and encounters with the legendary player.

Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell

Guest: Tyler R. Tynes
